Student.summary: The Student class contains characteristics of a student.

Id.exception: Thrown when the ID is not positive.

Name.exception: Thrown when the name of the student is empty or null.

Gender.exception: Thrown when the student's gender is not 'Male' or 'Female'.

BirthDate.value: Gets or sets student's date of birth.

GroupId.value: Gets or sets the identifier of the student's group.
GroupId.exception: Thrown when the group ID is not positive.

Equals.summary: Determines whether two Student instances are equal. Overrides the base method.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current student.
Equals.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current student; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Serves as the default hash function. Overrides the base method.
GetHashCode.returns: A hash code for the current student.

StudentGroup.summary: The StudentGroup class contains characteristics of a student group.

Id.value: Gets or sets the identifier of the student group.
Id.exception: Thrown when the ID is not positive.

Number.value: Gets or sets the number of the student group.
Number.exception: Thrown when the number of the group is empty or null.

Equals.summary: Determines whether two StudentGroup instances are equal. Overrides the base method.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current student group.
Equals.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current student group; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Serves as the default hash function. Overrides the base method.
GetHashCode.returns: A hash code for the current student group.

GroupId.value: Gets or sets the identifier of the student group that is assessed.

NumberOfSession.value: Gets or sets the number of the session in which the assessment is held.

MapperHelper.summary: The MapperHelper class contains extension methods for mapping a database record to an object model.

RecordToModel.summary: Creates an entity from the specified database record.
RecordToModel.param: The record to create an entity.
RecordToModel.returns: The entity created basing on the received database record.

RecordToGrade.summary: Creates an entity of one of two derived Grade types: pass-fail grade or point grade, from the specified database record.
RecordToGrade.param: The record to create an entity.
RecordToGrade.returns: The pass-fail grade or the point grade created basing on the received database record.

RecordToAssessment.summary: Creates an entity of one of two derived Assessment types: exam or test, from the specified database record.
RecordToAssessment.param: The record to create an assessment entity.
RecordToAssessment.returns: The exam or the test created basing on the received database record.

summary.summary: The QueryHelper class contains extension methods for creating an SQL query.

GetParameters.summary: Gets a list of parameters for SQL query from the specified list of fields of the class.
GetParameters.param: The list of fields of the class.
GetParameters.returns: The string that contains the parameters for an SQL query.

ValuesToParams.summary: Forms a string containing parameter-value pairs that is used in SQL query.
ValuesToParams.param: The list of fields of the class.
ValuesToParams.returns: The string that contains the parameter-value pairs for an SQL query.

GetFields.summary: Gets the string that consists of the names of fields of a class.
GetFields.param: The list of a class fields.
GetFields.returns: The string that consists of the names of fields.
